subproject.corporate outcome: Livelihoods and economic recovery generated, including infrastructure restoration, employment and sustainable income earning opportunities for crisis affected communities
subproject.description:
In March 2009, Sierra Leone was hit by the biggest eruption of violence since the end of the conflict in 2002.Violent clashes involving the supporters of the two main parties resulted in multiple injuries and destruction. Following a bi-party dialogues initiated by the ERSG and the PPRC and with support from he international community in Freetown, a Joint Communiqué was signed between the SLPP and the APC. Regarding the incidents of political violence, the President by a constitutional instrument dated 29 September 2009, established the Independent Review Panel.
The key tasks of Panel are to;
1) Review and determine the circumstance as well as establish the facts
2) Make necessary findings or conclusions
3) Recommend measures to be taken and mechanisms
subproject.title: JOINT COMMUNIQUE INDEPENDENT P
